channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SENTRON 7KM PAC3200
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SENTRON 7KM PAC3200

item.title: CVE-2024-41798|2024-10-08T08:40:16.947Z -- siemens -- sentron%207km%20pac3200
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SENTRON 7KM PAC3200 (All versions). Affected devices only provide a 4-digit PIN to protect from administrative access via Modbus TCP interface. Attackers with access to the Modbus TCP interface could easily bypass this protection by brute-force attacks or by sniffing the Modbus clear text communication.
